meanings.definition: A bitter-tasting, greenish-yellow fruit used in medicine.
meanings.sent1: The colocynth had a strong bitter taste when I tried it.
meanings.sent2: The herbalist used colocynth in the medicine to help with digestion.
meanings.sent3: The colocynth made a sour face when it realized it was meant for medicine.
meanings.sent4: The bitterness of the colocynth lingered in my mouth like a reminder of its healing properties.
meanings.sent5: The colocynth looked unappealing but was a powerful ingredient in the remedy.

meanings.definition: A plant of the gourd family, bearing colocynths.
meanings.sent1: The colocynth plant in the garden had vibrant green leaves.
meanings.sent2: Farmers harvested colocynths from the plant for their beneficial properties.
meanings.sent3: The colocynth plant joked with the pumpkin about their family resemblance.
meanings.sent4: The colocynth plant stood tall in the field, proud of its bitter fruits.
meanings.sent5: The colocynth plant's vines twisted and turned, producing its unique gourds.
